messages.title: Fair rules and fair chances
messages.content: Want to see rising levels of skills, and not rising levels of immigration. A future based on fair rules and fair chances. That is why we have pledged to control immigration with a tough but fair Australian-style points-based system.

messages.title: Your choice
messages.content: I love this country and am honoured to be your Prime Minister. I know I am tough and demanding and I make no apologies for that, because you deserve nothing less as we rebuild our economy, strengthen our society and change our politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Controlling immigration with a tough but fair Australian-style points-based system.

issues.immigration: Controlling immigration with a tough but fair Australian-style points-based system.

leaflet.personalStatement: I love this country and am honoured to be your Prime Minister.

quotes.text: Each of our pledges is substantial, deliverable and carefully costed, speaking to the values of Britain's mainstream majority - ordinary families, like the one in which I grew up - that want to get on, not simply get by.
